name: Egemen Kar
title: Frontend Developer

intro1.before: I'm a Frontend Developer currently working at
intro1.after: . It's a software company focused on improving e-commerce operations, ensuring smooth and efficient processes for online businesses.

intro2: I work with technologies like Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and React to build responsive, scalable web applications. With over 5 years of experience, I focus on creating seamless user experiences and integrating powerful tools to bring ideas to life.

projects.title: Projects
projects.comingSoonMessage: This isn't an exhaustive list of my projects. I'm constantly working on new and exciting ones. I'll be updating this section soon with more of my work. Stay tuned!
projects.description: I'm currently working on some innovative web applications and tools. Check back soon to see a showcase of my latest work in frontend development, including projects using Vue.js, React, and more.

portfolioSite.title: egmn.dev
portfolioSite.description: My personal portfolio website built with Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and Tailwind CSS. Features responsive design, dark mode, and internationalization.
